name: Grief (itch) (Timothee Fageot, Luca TRAMONTANA)
description:
The story takes place during the 80's in a nuclear power plant about a hundred miles from Dallas, Texas. Our character wakes up on the floor in his office in the middle of the night without a single memory. He naturally moves towards the supposed exit before finding himself in front of a mirror. Our character does not understand what he sees, the mirror reflects his soul. Panic-stricken, he tries to break his reflection by running headlong into the mirror before going mad.

        You will play as a scientist lost in a nuclear power plant with a very dark atmosphere and based on light effects. The goal of the game will be to get out of this plant by passing through the different levels that will be represented by different emotions that we go through during a grief.

How to play ? (Keyboard/Controller) 

  • Move : ZQSD / Left Joystick
  • Interact : E / A
  • Dash (Only for the level 2) : Space bar / X

Development Team :

Graphics : Luca TRAMONTANA

Programming : Timothée FAGEOT
